00033 def test_author_name():
00034     from roscreate.core import author_name
00035     val = author_name()
00036     assert val, val
00037     
00038 def test_read_template():
00039     from roscreate.core import read_template
00040     s = set()
00041     # this unit test will break if any of the templates get removed/renamed
00042     tests = ['Makefile.tmpl', 'stack.tmpl', 'mainpage.tmpl', 'CMakeLists.stack.tmpl']
00043     for f in tests:
00044         text = read_template(f)
00045         s.add(text)
00046     # simple assert to make sure we didn't read the same thing from each template
00047     assert len(s) == len(tests)
00048 
00049     # hardcode test against a known template
00050     text = read_template('Makefile.tmpl')        
00051     assert text == 'include $(shell rospack find mk)/cmake.mk'
